channel.title: Help, lol!
channel.description:
Hello all, well first off when i try and make the NPC's say instead of some1 else comming online i make it say my name instead..i save it run my server and it doesnt anything.
2- When i make my rights at 3 it wont even let me use the admin commands..so i put in co-owner and owner whitch ill end up deleting..when i go too owner and i go ::mod (name) even tho no one is there it says " you can only use 0,1 and 2." how do i change it so im using all of it coz im the owner of my server! :P
Please help
Regards- Jukesy[br][size=1]Posted on: June 02, 2007, 04:34:44 PM[/size][hr]ok, i made it so they say my name but they say im offline :( awwww im not offline..

item.title: Help, lol!
item.dc:creator: @Jukesy Jukesy
item.description:
@Jukesy wrote:

kk, will do , ty

For the ::mod thing
Try ::pmod (name)
